cmp: 车 (car/a vehicle/machine/to shape with a lathe, vehicle on land)
mng: disposition of troops, wave, spate, burst, spell, short period of time, classifier for events or states of short duration

exm.mng: group of people, camp, faction, sides in a dispute
troop arrangement, battle formation, line-up (of a sports team etc)
poised for battle, to square up for a fight
